scripts.build:dna: npm run build:zome && mkdir -p artifacts && $npm_package_config_bin/hc dna pack -o artifacts/file_share.dna dna/workdir
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dna && $npm_package_config_bin/hc app pack -o artifacts/file_share.happ dna/workdir
scripts.build:happ:dev: npm run build:dna && npm run build:profiles && $npm_package_config_bin/hc app pack -o artifacts/file_share_dev.happ dna/workdir_dev
scripts.build:webapp: npm run build -w webcomponents && npm run dist -w webapp
scripts.build:devtest: npm run clean:hc & npm run build:happ:dev && bash scripts/ts-bindings.sh && npm run build -w webcomponents && npm run build -w webapp
scripts.build:devtest:we: npm run clean:hc & npm run build:happ && bash scripts/ts-bindings.sh && npm run build -w webcomponents && npm run build -w webapp
scripts.devtest: npm run build:devtest && concurrently "npm run build:watch -w webcomponents" "npm run build:watch -w webapp" "npm run start:mem"
scripts.devtest:we: npm run build:devtest:we && npm run devtest -w we-applet
scripts.prodtest: npm run dist -w webapp && cross-env HC_APP_PORT=$(port) HC_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) ADD_PROFILES=1 concurrently "npm run dev:components" "npm run new-sandbox:mem" "sleep 7 && npm run start:ui -w webapp"
scripts.start:mem: cross-env HC_APP_PORT=$(port) HC_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) HAPP_BUILD_MODE='Debug' ADD_PROFILES=1 concurrently "npm run dev:components" "npm run new-sandbox:mem" "sleep 7 && npm run start:ui -w webapp"
scripts.start:local: echo START:LOCAL $INDEX & cross-env HC_APP_PORT=$(port) HC_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) HAPP_BUILD_MODE='Debug' ADD_PROFILES=1 concurrently "npm run _save-ports" "npm run dev:components" "npm run new-sandbox:local" "sleep 7 && npm run start:ui -w webapp"
scripts.start:public: cross-env HC_APP_PORT=$(port) HC_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) HAPP_BUILD_MODE='Debug' ADD_PROFILES=1 concurrently "npm run dev:components" "npm run new-sandbox:public" "sleep 7 && npm run start:ui -w webapp"
scripts.new-sandbox:mem: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=warn echo "pass" | $npm_package_config_bin/hc s --piped -f=$HC_ADMIN_PORT generate artifacts/file_share_dev.happ -a FileShareDev --run=$HC_APP_PORT network mem
scripts.new-sandbox:public: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=warn echo "pass" | $npm_package_config_bin/hc s --piped -f=$HC_ADMIN_PORT generate artifacts/file_share_dev.happ --run=$HC_APP_PORT -a FileShareDev network --bootstrap https://bootstrap.holo.host/ webrtc wss://signal.holo.host
scripts.new-sandbox:local: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=warn echo "pass" | $npm_package_config_bin/hc s --piped -f=$HC_ADMIN_PORT generate artifacts/file_share_dev.happ --run=$HC_APP_PORT -a FileShareDev network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:$BOOT_PORT webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:$SIGNAL_PORT
scripts.serve:save: echo SIGNAL_PORT=$SIGNAL_PORT && echo $SIGNAL_PORT > .hc_signalenv && echo $BOOT_PORT > .hc_bootenv && echo BOOT_PORT=$BOOT_PORT
scripts.serve: cross-env BOOT_PORT=$(cat .hc_bootenv) SIGNAL_PORT=$(cat .hc_signalenv) npm run serve:run
scripts.network2: npm run clean:hc & npm run build:devtest && cross-env BOOT_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run serve:save" "npm run serve:run" "cross-env INDEX=0 npm run start:local" "sleep 1 && cross-env INDEX=1 npm run start:local"
scripts.network3: npm run clean:hc & npm run build:devtest && cross-env BOOT_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run serve:save" "npm run serve:run" "cross-env INDEX=0 npm run start:local" "sleep 1 && cross-env INDEX=1 npm run start:local" "sleep 2 && cross-env INDEX=2 npm run start:local"
scripts.network:we: npm run clean:hc & npm run network:local2 -w we-applet
scripts.local:sandbox: echo INDEX $INDEX & echo PORTS $BOOT_PORT $SIGNAL_PORT $HC_APP_PORT $HC_ADMIN_PORT & RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=warn echo "pass" | $npm_package_config_bin/hc s --piped -f=$HC_ADMIN_PORT run $INDEX
scripts._local: cross-env BOOT_PORT=$(cat .hc_bootenv) SIGNAL_PORT=$(cat .hc_signalenv) HC_APP_PORT=$(cat .hc_app_$INDEX) HC_ADMIN_PORT=$(cat .hc_admin_$INDEX) HAPP_BUILD_MODE='Debug' ADD_PROFILES=1 concurrently "npm run local:sandbox" "sleep 7 && npm run start:ui-only -w webapp"
scripts.launch: echo pass | hc-launch --piped -n 1 artifacts/file_share_dev.webhapp network mem
scripts.launch:we: echo pass | hc-launch --piped -n 1 artifacts/file_share-we_applet.webhapp network mem
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @file-share/elements && npm t -w @file-share/tests
scripts.package:webapp: rm -rf artifacts/file_share-webapp-ui.zip && cd webapp/dist && rm -f *.map && bestzip ../../artifacts/file_share-webapp-ui.zip * && cd ../../ && $npm_package_config_bin/hc web-app pack webapp/webhapp.workdir -o artifacts/file_share.webhapp
scripts.package:we: rm -rf artifacts/file_share-we_applet-ui.zip & cd we-applet/dist && rm -f *.map && bestzip ../../artifacts/file_share-we_applet-ui.zip * && cd ../../ && $npm_package_config_bin/hc web-app pack we-applet/webhapp.workdir -o artifacts/file_share-we_applet.webhapp && npm run cp:we
scripts.dist:we: npm run build -w we-applet && npm run package:we
scripts.dl-test-release: rm -rf release & mkdir -p release & gh release download manual-release -D release -R lightningrodlabs/file-share
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:hc && npm run clean:npm && npm run clean
